body:
I thought I would stick this here, for everyone to say if they are going to leave avicus for a while because of school starting. If you ask me, the lounge needs not be filled with goodbyes for the same reason.

Oh and yeah I'm leaving too.

title: Leaving avicus for school

replies.body:
This is a good idea, it is very smart of you to leave for something that will actually get you somewhere in the future.

Good luck in school and with your future!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Depends what school you go to..... Mine is BULL...... Shit..

I ask a teacher : "What is the operating system on this computer?"

She says: "HP."

WTF! They dont even fcking know! But gl Sean!! <3
